1981 Ed., ยง 40-1307.

DC CODE ยง 50-507

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Nothing in this chapter shall in any way limit the rights or remedies which are otherwise available to a consumer under any other law.
Any action brought pursuant to this chapter shall be commenced within 4 years of the date of original delivery of the motor vehicle to the consumer.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Other rights or remedies; limitations on actions.
